author: mturk
msg: DAEMON-195: Do not wait on stop thread to finish. If Java stop method calls System.exit method will never return to the manager and this will be reported as broken pipe

author: tv
msg: Throw/handle an explicit CacheException when a cache manager instance cannot read its configuration. Fixes JCS-22

author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-3490: Maven configuration: backport test-framework/java for consistency with trunk structure

author: mturk
msg: Add option to start service from command line. Together with stop this replaces the need for 'net start, net stop'
